trans-unit.source: Represents the base functionality for all menus.
trans-unit.target: Representa a funcionalidade de base para todos os menus.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref> replace and add functionality to the Menu control of previous versions, Menu is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"> </xref> substituir e adicionar funcionalidades para o Menu o controlo de versões anteriores, Menu é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e para utilização futura, se escolher.

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe é a classe base para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar uma instância desta classe.

trans-unit.source: The menus for an application consist of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os menus de consist uma aplicação de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: These can contain other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects, representing submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Estes podem conter outros <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos, que representa os itens do submenu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects can be stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that is used to display shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos podem ser armazenados num <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>para apresentar como uma estrutura de menu completo para um formulário ou uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>que é utilizado para apresentar os menus de atalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe fornece uma funcionalidade que é comum para todas as classes de menu.

trans-unit.source: Unlike many base classes, the Menu class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário das classes base muitos, a classe de Menu utiliza respetivas classes derivadas para definir muitas das respetivas propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A> property to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application.
trans-unit.target: Se estiver a utilizar o menu numa aplicação vários documentos interface (MDI), pode utilizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A>propriedade para especificar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>que mostra uma lista de formulários de subordinado MDI abertos na sua aplicação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property contains a list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects stored in the menu class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade contém uma lista de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos armazenados na classe de menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, this property contains all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, esta propriedade contém todas as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos que são apresentados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property represents the submenu items associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade representa os itens do submenu associados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the Menu class also provides methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together.
trans-unit.target: Para além das propriedades que são fornecidas para todas as classes derivadas de menu, a classe de Menu também fornece métodos, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, que permitem-lhe criar novos menus de menus existentes e também o menu de intercalação dois estruturas em conjunto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Menu class also defines the nested class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de Menu também define a classe aninhada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: This class defines the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe define a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos utilizados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection> class to add and remove menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar os métodos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>classe para adicionar e remover itens de menu de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Since <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is an abstract class, only inherited classes can call the Menu constructor.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>é uma classe abstracta, apenas as classes herdadas podem chamar o construtor de Menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> containing the objects to add to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> que contém os objetos a adicionar ao menu.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> that is passed as a parameter to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> que é transmitida como um parâmetro para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method copies the entire list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects (stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Este método copia a lista completa das <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos (armazenado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>transmitida para `menuSrc`) para o menu atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in your derived class to clone <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método na classe derivada clonar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: They can then be reused by other classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, podem ser reutilizadas por outras classes que derivem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> to copy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> para copiar.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo identificador de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um identificador ao menu se o método for bem sucedida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disposes dos recursos, que não sejam de memória, utilizada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>para a memória foi occupying pode ser recuperada através da recolha de lixo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>está a utilizar não irá ser libertado até chamadas de recolha de lixo a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>destrutor do objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*> method should search for a handle.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>método deve procurar um identificador.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that contains the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> que contém o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a handle, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> field as the type, and the handle of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Para procurar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>com um identificador, passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle>campo como o tipo e o identificador do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>que pretende localizar como o valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a shortcut, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> field as the type, and the Shortcut value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Para procurar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>utilizar um atalho, passar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut>campo como o tipo e o valor de atalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>que pretende localizar como o valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The type of item to use to find the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item a utilizar para localizar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The item to use to find the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O item a utilizar para localizar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that matches value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> que corresponde ao valor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a posição em que um item de menu deve ser inserido no menu.

trans-unit.source: The merge order of a menu item specifies the relative position that this menu item will assume if the menu structure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is contained in is merged with another.
trans-unit.target: A ordem de intercalação de um item de menu Especifica a posição relativa que este item de menu irão assumir se o menu de estrutura que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>está contido no intercalado com o outro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The merge order position for the menu item to be merged.
trans-unit.target: A posição de ordem de intercalação para o item de menu ser intercaladas.

trans-unit.source: The position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.
trans-unit.target: A posição em que um item de menu deve ser inserido no menu.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*> method should search for a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>método deve procurar um atalho.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> que contém este menu.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that this menu is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe obter uma referência para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>que este menu é suplemento nele contidos</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve `null` se o menu não está contido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer se o menu faz uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, ou se o menu não está contido em qualquer menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar se um menu está atualmente a ser utilizado bem como para determinar onde.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> que contém este menu.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> que contém este menu.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> this menu is currently located in.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe obter uma referência a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>Este menu se encontra atualmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve `null` se o menu não está contido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode ocorrer se o menu faz uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, ou se o menu não está contido em qualquer menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar se um menu está atualmente a ser utilizado bem como para determinar onde.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> que contém este menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the window handle for the menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o identificador de janela para o menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the handle to the menu to perform special operations to the menu outside of the functionality provided by this class or its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade ao obter o identificador para o menu para executar operações especiais ao menu fora a funcionalidade fornecida por esta classe ou respetivas classes derivadas.

trans-unit.source: The HMENU value of the menu.
trans-unit.target: O valor HMENU do menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu contains any menu items.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este menu contém quaisquer itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are assigned to this menu.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este método para determinar se qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos são todos atribuídos a este menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Isto é equivalente ao procurar `null` no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this menu contains <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este menu contém <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that is used to display a list of multiple document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> que é utilizado para apresentar uma lista de vários documentos interface (MDI) os formulários subordinados.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> has been specified to display the list of open child windows in an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para determinar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>foi especificado para apresentar a lista de janelas subordinadas aberto numa aplicação MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To use a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> as an MDI list, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to be used.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar um específico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>como uma lista MDI, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>a ser utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item displaying a list of MDI child forms that are open in the application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> que representa o item de menu que apresenta uma lista de formulários subordinados MDI abertos na aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects associated with the menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos associados ao menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para obter uma referência à lista de itens de menu que atualmente estão armazenados no menu.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> objects, the MenuItems property contains the entire menu structure in the control.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>objetos, a propriedade MenuItems contém a estrutura de menu todo no controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> class, the MenuItems property contains the list of submenu items associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>que classe, a propriedade MenuItems contém a lista de itens do submenu associados <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Com a referência à coleção de itens de menu do menu (fornecido por esta propriedade), pode adicionar e remover itens de menu, determinar o número total de itens de menu e desmarque a lista de itens de menu da coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manutenção da coleção de itens de menu para um menu, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName>documentação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the list of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> que representa a lista de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos armazenados no menu.

trans-unit.source: Merges the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects of one menu with the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Une o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> objetos de um menu com o menu atual.

trans-unit.source: This method merges <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects from one menu with the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Este método intercala <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos a partir de um menu com o menu atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are merged according to the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos são intercalados, de acordo com os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: A intercalação de menu é geralmente feita para intercalar os menus de um formulário de principal de vários documentos Interface MDI () com os respetivos formulário de subordinado MDI Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Este é realizado automaticamente o .NET Framework language runtime.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um formulário de principal MDI contém um conjunto de menus para processamento de ficheiros e o formulário de subordinado MDI também tem de itens de menu relacionado com ficheiros, os conjuntos de menu serão automaticamente intercalar um menu de ficheiro único definido quando o formulário subordinado é apresentado no formulário principal MDI.

trans-unit.source: You can use the MergeMenu method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o método MergeMenu se são intercalar duas estruturas de menu que não fazem parte de uma aplicação MDI.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can be called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes to merge two or more objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação pode ser chamada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>classes para intercalar duas ou mais objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: To merge two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: A intercalação dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>objetos utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> whose menu items are merged with the menu items of the current menu.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> cujos itens de menu são intercalados com os itens de menu do menu atual.

trans-unit.source: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.
trans-unit.target: Foi tentada a unir o menu com ele próprio.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: At design time, this property is set to the programmatic identifier of the control.
trans-unit.target: No momento da conceção, esta propriedade é definida para o identificador programático do controlo.

trans-unit.source: However, this property has no bearing on the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, esta propriedade não tem efeito no controlo em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa o nome.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Os processos de uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, transmitida por referência que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter foi processado pelo controlo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets user-defined data associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define os dados definidos pelo utilizador associados ao controlo.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa os dados.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um <xref:System.String>que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a <xref:System.String> that includes the type and the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: O método ToString devolve um <xref:System.String>que inclui o tipo e o número de itens a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>propriedade do controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
